name: Magic Shop (itch) (Herlehos)
description:
Magic Shop is a colorful and magic Management Game we made at the end of our first year of studies.

In Magic Shop, you must help Silverster the Stone building the best shop of the world!

Dev Team:

DELEARD Victor - FERRERE Clarence - OUALID Nathan - ROTZINGER Inès - SOLEILHAC Lauryn - VEVERT Morgane
